<title level="1" pfs="">[Dragon's Blood Puffball](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1380)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

This bulbous, deep red fungus looks like an enormous, decaying rose.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Fungus](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 26

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 24

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 8">[Dragon's Blood Puffball](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1380)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Fungus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=77" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=108" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #165: Eyes of Empty Death](/Sources.aspx?ID=81) pg. 79</row>

**Perception** +12; motion sense 60 feet, no vision

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +14

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +1

**Con** +4

**Int** -5

**Wis** +0

**Cha** -2
</row>

**Motion Sense** The puffball senses motion through vibration and air movement.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 24 

**Fort** +20 

**Ref** +15 

**Will** +12 

</row>

**HP** 170

**Immunities**
bleed, [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=145), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Weaknesses**
piercing 10

**Spore Explosion** When the dragon's blood puffball dies, it explodes, dealing 7d8 poison damage to each creature in a 20-foot emanation (DC 26 basic Fortitude save).

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 10 feet

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
bloom +18,
**Damage** 2d10+8 bludgeoning plus 1d6 poison

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
spore jet +18 ([range increment 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 3d8 poison

</column>
